name: Battle Breakout
description:
I love 2-player games where you can battle hard against a friend. So I wanted to try to create what I would consider to be the perfect 2-player battle game. It is very easy to learn but can take a long time to master, since there are tons of special items that keep the game interesting: lasers, rotators, ball spin, multi-ball, brick wall, bomb, cannon and even a frog that will bug your opponent.

You can also play against a computer. Set the AI level to 99 in the settings to get a really difficult AI opponent!

Play with a shared keyboard, a touchscreen or with two game pads!
